nodes.text: Malievo Valaine was a Human male representative of Esstran Exports during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He frequented the Cartel Bazaar on the Imperial space station Vaiken Spacedock.

The Reputation Vendor for Esstran Exports on the Imperial Fleet, Malievo Valaine was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on May 4, 2015 along with the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer Packs—the first of the Explorer Packs, Cartel Market packs to which the Esstran Exports Reputation corresponds. Unlike other Reputation Vendors, Valaine does not appear in the Cartel Bazaar on both factions' fleets; instead, Serrath is the Republic faction's vendor.
